# shreyans.sh llms.txt

> A personal website showcasing Shreyans' projects, thoughts, and explorations in technology and life.

- [X Profile](https://twitter.com/CodeWShreyans)
- [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/CodeWithShreyans)
- [Linkedin Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sjain07)
- [Email](shreyans@shreyans.sh)

- [Personal Reflections](https://shreyans.sh/thoughts): To share personal reflections and thoughts on various topics.
- [My Work](https://shreyans.sh/projects): Showcases various personal projects developed by Shreyans.
- [OThree AI Chat App](https://shreyans.sh/othree): Promote the OThree app for private, offline AI chat using LLaMA 3 on Apple devices.
